OOC: Nightlight still is inside the base


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She made her way to the outside of the base.  She followed her 
nose 
> futher still from the base.  She sniffed the ground, her nose 
firmly 
> following the trail of the strange scent.  She was just to 
determind 
> to not stop but to find out why the strange scent was there and 
whom 
> it came from.  She was far outside the base and a few miles from 
the 
> base by nightfall.
> 
> 
> Sleep was to finally over take her.  She curled up in fox mode 
under 
> a tree and slept soundly.
